thread.title: Wellington woman with sick kids barred from hospital shuttle
thread.title_full: Wellington woman with sick kids barred from hospital shuttle

title: Wellington woman with sick kids barred from hospital shuttle
text:
Wellington woman with sick kids barre... Wellington woman with sick kids barred from hospital shuttle Next Story Prev Story 7 hrs ago Read more: Southland Times 
Dawn Gray and her twin 6-year-old boys were forced to hitch-hike to Wellington Hospital after a shuttle driver refused to take them. Gray was picked up by a good samaritan, who took a photo of the family as proof.   Southland Times.
